column4: Can anyone tell me if a firewall is automatically installed with ubuntu 5.04, and how I go about investigating it please?
firewall is part of linux iptables and you dont use a firewall you use a firwall manager like firestarter only if needed
Cheers, I've seen mention of this 'firestarter', but I've not seen anything on how to use it!
Eh?  Everyone's squeeling about safety and security on the 'net
which is why Mac and Linux are safe, just Windows has the problem
